entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is mentioned as the one who conducted an interview with Harry. She is expected to publish her article in The Quibbler.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was interviewed by Rita and shared his story about Voldemort's return.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who returned, and Harry shared his story about it with Rita.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the daughter of a person expecting an article on Crumple-Horned Snorkacks in The Quibbler.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is mentioned as the publication where Rita's interview with Harry and an article about Crumple-Horned Snorkacks are expected to be published.

entities.name: crumple-horned snorkack
entities.description: Crumple-Horned Snorkacks are mentioned as a creature that is the subject of an article in The Quibbler.

relationships.description: Rita conducted an interview with Harry, and he shared his story about Voldemort's return.
Luna is associated with The Quibbler as her father expects an article on Crumple-Horned Snorkacks to be published in it.
Harry experienced Voldemort's return, and he shared his story about it with Rita.
